revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=A6 |asin=B009B6MAX4 |fcc_date=08/03/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=V7TA6 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350 |fla1=4 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=non-removable |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |lan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags=portable,schematics |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Tenda_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Tenda_[0-9A-F]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_pass=admin |default_ch= }} ''Wireless N150 Mini AP/Router''
[http://www.tenda.cn/tendacn/product/show.aspx?productid=408 Product page] "10011324" and "V1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The FCC schematics states the device uses a 4MB Flash chip (MX25L3206EM2I-12G) and a 32MB RAM chip (EM63A165TS-6G). This is assumed to be mostly correct. Per the FCC manual, the default SSID is '''Tenda_XXXXXX''' (where '''XXXXXX''' is the last 6 digits of MAC). The device has an unsoldered usb 2.0 port. [https://openwrt.org/toh/tenda/a6 Tenda A6 on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
